message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. How about $130?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $115?
I can see you're really interested in the product, but I'm not ready to go down to $115 just yet. I'll meet you at $125, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand you're trying to make a compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $110?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm not quite there yet. I'll meet you at $117, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $117, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $110?
I've already met you at $117, and you're asking me to go back down to $110? I'm not willing to do that. I'll stick with my previous offer of $117, it's my final counteroffer.
